task_not_found_or_unauthorized_update: Task not found or you're not authorized to update it
task_not_found_or_unauthorized_delete: Task not found or you're not authorized to delete it
role_not_found: The required role is not registered in the database
too_large: the file size must not exceed {{maxSize}} mb
invalid_type: only the following file types are allowed: {{types}}
invalid_type_images: only the following images types are allowed: {{types}}
password_min: password must be at least 6 characters
password_lowercase: password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password_uppercase: password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password_number: password must contain at least one number
password_special: password must contain at least one special character
email_taken: this email is already in use
phone_taken: this phone number is already in use
task_title_max: title must be less than 100 characters
task_description_max: description must be less than 1000 characters
invalid_files_to_remove: make sure the files you want to remove are valid
